message.entry: The input message must be a logical or numeric vector.
The input message must contain only binary values.
Length of the input message must be a multiple of the number of bits in an input symbol.
The puncture pattern parameter must be a vector of real or logical values.
The puncture pattern parameter must be a binary vector of 1''s and 0''s only.
The puncture pattern parameter length must be at least the number of bits in an output symbol.
The input message length divided by the base code rate must be an\ninteger multiple of the length of the puncture pattern parameter.
The initial state must be an integer scalar between 0 and (TRELLIS.numStates-1). See POLY2TRELLIS.
